```{r}
library(rvest)
link <- "http://www.gov.cn/guowuyuan/2019-03/16/content_5374314.htm"
web <- read_html(link,encoding="utf-8") #读取数据，规定代码
position<- web %>% html_nodes("div.pages_content") %>% html_text()
library(jiebaRD)
library(jiebaR)
engine_s<-worker(stop_word = "C:\\Users\\Liuye\\OneDrive\\stopwords")
seg<-segment(position,engine_s)
f<-freq(seg)
f<-f[order(2),decreasing=TRUE,]
print(f)
library(wordcloud2)
f1<-f[1:150,]
wordcloud2(f1,size = 0.8,shape = "star")




```
